item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-07
  • City: SADDLE BROOK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TWO AIR PACKAGES WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH AND MARKED RUSH-PERISHABLE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD IN EACH PACKAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER TO ANOTHER CONSIGNEE IS 1Z35E0Y10191295694.
